label: Bathroom Accessories and Rugs
description: Products and accessories for bathrooms, including rugs, mats, caddies, and storage solutions.
intents: Find a rug or mat for my bathroom
Organize my shower or bath products
Add decorative accessories to my bathroom

subcategories.label: Bath Mats and Rugs
subcategories.description: Soft, absorbent mats and rugs for use in the bathroom.

subcategories.label: Shower and Bath Storage
subcategories.description: Caddies, shelves, and other storage solutions for use in the shower or bath.

subcategories.label: Bathroom Accessories
subcategories.description: Decorative and functional accessories for use in the bathroom.
